info.title: Identity Access Hub API
info.description: Multi-application, multi-tenant identity and access management API

post.description: Creates a new user in the specified tenant

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users, optionally filtered by tenant
Retrieves a specific user by their ID
Retrieves all active roles

post.description: Creates a new role with specified permissions

get.description: Retrieves a specific role by its ID
Retrieves all roles for a specific app

post.description: Assigns a role to a user
Revokes a role from a user

get.description: Retrieves all roles assigned to a user

post.description: Creates a new application in the system

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of applications
Retrieves a specific application by its ID

delete.description: Deletes an application and all associated tenants

put.summary: Set default subscription plan for app
put.description: Sets the default subscription plan for an application

get.summary: Get default subscription plan for app
get.description: Retrieves the default subscription plan for an application

put.description: Updates the Zod schema and default settings for an application

get.description: Retrieves the Zod schema and default settings for an application
Exports complete app configuration as JSON for mock data
Retrieves public information about an app (id, name, description, settingsSchema)
Retrieves the public key for JWT verification for a specific app

post.description: Generates new RSA key pair for JWT signing/verification for a specific app
Rotates existing RSA key pair for JWT signing/verification for a specific app
Creates a new tenant for an application with automatic subscription assignment

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of tenants
Retrieves a specific tenant by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing tenant with full access (superuser only)

delete.description: Deletes a tenant and all associated users

put.description: Updates tenant with restricted fields (tenant admin only - cannot change isActive)

get.summary: Get public tenant info by slug and app ID
get.description: Retrieves public information about a tenant using its subdomain (slug) and app ID to handle duplicates across apps

put.description: Updates tenant settings with validation against app settings schema

get.description: Retrieves tenant settings or app default settings if tenant has no custom settings

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token
Creates a new user account for an existing tenant
Creates a new tenant and its admin user in one operation
Changes the password for an authenticated user
Refreshes an access token using a valid refresh token

get.description: Returns the public key for validating system user tokens

post.description: Complete signup/login using magic link
Send magic link email for login or signup (auto-detects based on user existence)
Creates a new subscription for a tenant

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of subscriptions
Retrieves a specific subscription by its ID

delete.description: Cancels a subscription by its ID

put.description: Changes the plan of an existing subscription

get.description: Retrieves the active subscription for a specific tenant
Retrieves the features available to a tenant based on their active subscription

post.description: Processes payment for a subscription and activates it if successful
Creates a new subscription plan for an application.

get.description: Retrieves subscription plans with optional filtering by app.
Retrieves details of a specific subscription plan by ID.

post.description: Creates a new permission for an application or system-wide

get.description: Retrieves all permissions (app-specific and system-wide)
Retrieves a specific permission by its ID
Retrieves all permissions for a specific application

post.description: Creates a new feature flag in the system

key.description: Unique key for the feature flag

name.description: Display name for the feature flag

isActive.description: Whether the feature flag is active

isTenantConfigurable.description: Whether tenants can override this flag

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of feature flags
Retrieves a specific feature flag by its ID

get.summary: Get all effective feature flags for a tenant
get.description: Retrieves all active feature flags with their effective values for a specific tenant

get.summary: Get specific tenant feature flag value
get.description: Retrieves the effective value of a specific feature flag for a tenant

put.summary: Create or update feature flag override
put.description: Creates or updates a tenant feature flag override

get.description: Retrieves feature flag overrides with optional filtering

get.summary: Get feature flag override by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific feature flag override by its ID
